title: (x) Genuine wooden type blocks - similar to Knockout, Balboa {Chris K, Alessandro}
content:
Can anyone ID this baby? I need to match it (if possible) and although I can get close with Compacta (too square), Impact (too wide) or Placard (shame about the l.c. ’a’) I reckon you guys can do better than that...

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [woodType.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20070806220040/http:/typophile.com/files/woodType.jpg) | 349.29 KB |

 [‹ (x) flourished script used in Martha's new mag Blueprint\* - Fling {Patricia}](http://web.archive.org/web/20070806220040/http:/typophile.com/node/19600 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) dingbat font with cute farm animals - Dingetjes {Mark Inman (self)} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20070806220040/http:/typophile.com/node/19594 "Go to next forum topic")
author: JonPhillips

comments.content:
Something from the Knockout series should get you pretty close...  
 [http://www.typography.com/catalog/knockout/testdriver/ko26.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20070806220040/http:/www.typography.com/catalog/knockout/testdriver/ko26.html "http://www.typography.com/catalog/knockout/testdriver/ko26.html")
Thanks very much guys, excellent recommendations
